title: FIFA 15 Ultimate Team v1.6.1 + data
description:
FIFA 15 Ultimate Team by EA SPORTS features over 10,000 players from over 500 licensed teams. Plus, over 30 real leagues and stadiums! Build a dream squad of footballers and put them to the test. From the English Premier League, La Liga, and MLS, to the German Bundesliga and beyond. Take the thrills with you wherever you are with the most authentic soccer game on Google Play.
This app offers in-app purchases. You may disable in-app purchasing using your device settings.

BUILD YOUR ULTIMATE TEAM
Earn, trade, and collect superstars like Lionel Messi and Eden Hazard to create your own fantasy team. Choose your play style, formation, kits, and more.

PLAY IN QUICK SIMULATION MODE
Put your management skills to the test with new Quick Simulations. Set up your squad, start the match, and watch it unfold. Make smart subs, tactical tweaks, and gauge team effort along the way. Your match results depend entirely on your ability to manage player skills and chemistry â€“ taking authenticity to the next level.

OR TAKE IT TO THE PITCH! 
If youâ€™re new to FIFA on mobile, try out our â€œCasual Controlsâ€, with elegantly simple buttons like â€œshootâ€, â€œpassâ€, or â€œsprintâ€. Once youâ€™re feeling comfortable, move on to â€œClassic Controlsâ€, which let you add either â€œthrough passesâ€ or â€œskill movesâ€ to your gaming arsenal. Or, you can interact with your team directly, tapping on players to pass the ball and swiping towards the net to shoot. Plus, if you have an external controller â€“ donâ€™t miss the chance to use it on the pitch for the first time

REAL WORLD MATCH UPS
Play your favorite teamâ€™s next fixture, plus 3 other major match-ups happening around the world â€“ every week!
Jump into the action and feel the passion of your favorite sport with FIFA 15 Ultimate Team!

Whatâ€™s new:
Hey footballers! Weâ€™ve made some off-the-pitch improvements to get you into the game faster and keep you playing like a pro. Update now for the best experience.
Thanks for playing FIFA 15 Ultimate Team.

** This game has superior graphics and is packed with tons of real football leagues, teams, and players. Please make sure you have at least 1.35GB of free space on your device. **


Install APK,Place data folder in SDCard/Android/Obb/ and play.
Requires Android 2.3.3 and up
